column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''14''' is the fourteenth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "The War of the Ring: A Linguistic Review" — [[Carl F. Hostetter]].
* "The Elves at Koivienéni: A New Quenya Sentence" — analyzed by [[Christopher Gilson]] and [[Patrick H. Wynne]].
** '''The above article is previously unpublished primary material from the Tolkien archives.'''
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
